name: Rune Factory 3: A Fantasy Harvest Moon
name_original: Rune Factory 3: A Fantasy Harvest Moon
description:
Rune Factory 3: A Fantasy Harvest Moon is an action-RPG game developed by Neverland. It came out on 09-11-2010. It was published by Natsume. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Rune Factory 3: A Fantasy Harvest Moon on Nintendo DS.
It was produced by Shinji Motoki and Yoshifumi Hashimoto. Kenichi Murakami and Masahide Miyata directed the game. It was scored by Tomoko Morita.
